description: Wurtz +‎ -ite, for Charles-Adolphe Wurtz, French chemist.

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to wurtzite crystal structure, a hexagonal crystal system named after the mineral wurtzite.
examples: A new family of semiconductors has been synthesized for the first time in the form of wurtzite phase nanocrystals of Cu2ZnAS4−x and CuZn2AS4.

entries.meaning: (mineralogy) A dark brown zinc iron sulfide mineral ((Zn,Fe)S), a form of sphalerite.
